Name: GeneralRestartPos
Notes: Defines the respawn point for a Star Ball. The respawn point needs to be linked to a Star Ball (Tamakoro). The respawn point will be used if the player's current spawn ID matches this object's Obj_arg0. The active player spawn point, Star Ball and Star Ball respawn point have to be in the same zone.

Obj_arg0.Name: Spawn ID
Obj_arg0.Description: The player's spawn ID to which this respawn point belongs.
